front.title: A Framework for L3VPN Performance Monitoring

abstract.t: The capability of BGP/MPLS IP Virtual Private Networks (L3VPN) performance monitoring (PM) is important to meet the Service Level Agreement(SLA) for the service beared. Since multipoint-to-point or multipoint-to-multipoint (MP2MP) network model applies, flow identifying is a big challenge for L3VPN PM. This document specifies the framework and mechanisms for the application of L3VPN PM.
